.. py:class:: Element(origin, span, sigma)

   Base class for cuboid elements

   .. py:method:: getCoordsRecursively()

      Calculates the global coordinates of the element's vertices.

      :returns: **coords** -- Cartesian coordinates of element vertices
      :rtype: float[:,3]


   .. py:method:: getConductanceVals()


   .. py:method:: getConductanceIndices()
